Working R code with labels top 50 (instead of 400) ig van 2014 top colour:

r ggplot(sorted_top_50,aes(x=colorname,y=count))+ geom_bar(colour=head(colour_hex_strings_all,50), stat=“identity”,fill=head(colour_hex_strings_all, 50),width=1,position = position_dodge(width = 0.005)+ scale_x_discrete(limits = sorted_top_50$colorname)+theme( axis.text.x = element_text(angle=90, hjust=1, vjust=0.5,size=10))
